theDragonkin:Whirlwind.NAME: Whirlwind
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn and when you enter this stance, draw a Card.

theDragonkin:Tempest.NAME: Tempest
DESCRIPTION: #yAttacks deal #b3 Additional damage. NL increases the effectiveness of #yOrbs by #b3. NL Channel #yRain when you exit this stance.

theDragonkin:Downdraft.NAME: Downdraft
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b3 additional block from cards. NL increases the effectiveness of #yOrbs by #b3. NL Channel #yJade #ySpirit when you exit this stance.

theDragonkin:Cyclone.NAME: Cyclone
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b3 additional block from cards. NL #yAttacks deal #b3 Additional damage. NL Channel #yRazor #yWind when you exit this stance.
